name: contact_capture
title: Contact Database capture log
description: Schema for 10-10-25 Capture sheet in Contact Database.xlsx

fields.name: School
fields.description: School or organisation name captured during outreach

fields.name: Contact person (role)
fields.description: Primary contact name with role context

fields.name: Phone
fields.description: Primary phone number captured for the contact

fields.name: Email
fields.description: Email address captured for the contact

fields.name: Addresses
fields.description: Free-form address information captured from the sheet

fields.name: Planes
fields.description: Aircraft or fleet notes gathered during outreach

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Narrative notes captured by the outreach team

fields.name: Type
fields.description: Captured organisation classification from the sheet
